info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 62468
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;pacoupa.ademe.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 62468
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;pacoupa.ademe.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
ademe.fr.	1800	IN	SOA	ace.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2376439733 10000 2400 604800 1800

request:
OPTIONS / HTTP/1.1
Host: pacoupa.ademe.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, Authorization Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * Allow: GET Allow: HEAD Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate Content-Security-Policy: default-src https://tally.so; connect-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr https://api-adresse.data.gouv.fr https://data.ademe.fr https://sentry.incubateur.net; font-src 'self'; media-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://stats.beta.gouv.fr https://tally.so 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'self' data:; frame-ancestors 'self' https://tally.so https://coachcopro.preprod.centralweb.fr/ https://www.coachcopro.com; base-uri 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; form-action 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; block-all-mixed-content ; upgrade-insecure-requests ; frame-src https://tally.so; Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: cross-origin Date: Sun, 29 Jun 2025 04:57:34 GMT Etag: "cji0lia2591jl" Permissions-Policy: fullscreen=(), display-capture=(), camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=() Referrer-Policy: no-referrer, strict-origin-when-cross-origin Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Request-Id: e80e3b15-5b3e-4d01-b1f7-a12240a0dccb X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block 405: Method Not Allowed

405

Method Not Allowed.

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: pacoupa.ademe.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: pacoupa.ademe.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://pacoupa.ademe.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
